page.title: 08NINE ACRES PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Nine Acres is a primary school for children aged 5-9.It is a single storey school of brick concrete and steel.There are eight classrooms, although only six are used at present to accommadate 183 children.Of the other two other classrooms,one is used as a science workshop(for all Island schools)the other one as a playgroup for pre-school children.The staff consists of 1 headteacher, 6 classteachers,2 ancillary helpers, 3 dinner ladies,1 caretaker,3 cleaners and one science technician.The school has a large assembly hall,two libraries,an office,a music room,a staff room and store rooms.There is an uncovered swimming pool 10m x 8m.There is a kitchen attached to the school which provides school dinners for 8 schools. .
